strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy happy weekend everybody! Here are some things we think are worth checking out:

  • Party in the streets: Get hyped tomorrow at Hog Fest and the Razorbacks’ open spring practice! 
  • Cleanup: Participate in the city spring cleanup tomorrow at Lake Fayetteville. 
  • Jumps & flips: Go see the Monster Truckz Mayhem Tour at the Benton County Fairgrounds this weekend! 
  • Music history in art: There will be a new music exhibition at the 214 CACHE Art Gallery in Springdale starting today — go check it out!
  • Performances: The Black Music Expo is today and tomorrow at The Jones Center in Springdale. 
  • Live score: The Cinema of the Ozarks is presenting a screening with a live orchestra tomorrow in Rogers. Proceeds will go toward Ukrainian relief. 
  • Music around town: If you’re looking for live music this weekend, you’ll find plenty of options on this list. 
  • Crafty: Bring a friend and make mosaics at the Rogers Experimental House this evening. 
  • Sunny & fresh: Don’t forget about Farmers Markets!! 

Be safe, have fun, and maybe get some rest too. See you Monday!
